name: SleepyLullabies
0:
”Alexa, start Sleepy Lullabies.”
”Alexa, open Sleepy Lullabies.”
”Alexa, ask Sleepy Lullabies to begin.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleepy lullabies
des:
Sleepy lullabies plays soothing lullabies to help you relax and get to sleep.

The following lullabies are available:

• Moon and Little Stars
• Baby Sleep
• Brahms Music Box
• Two hour Lullaby

PREMIUM PACK FEATURES:

• Unlimited lullaby playback, a daily limit applies otherwise
• Enables looping of the lullabies

HOW TO USE:

Enable Sleepy Lullabies by clicking the "enable" button above, then say "Alexa, open Sleepy Lullabies".

Sleepy Lullabies will play each lullaby in sequence and then stop.
Premium Pack subscribers can loop the lullabies until you say "Alexa, stop", just say "Alexa, loop on" while the lullabies are playing. 
To set a custom time limit, say "Alexa, stop in 1 hour" or any other duration of time, while the skill is playing.

ROUTINES: 

You can also automatically start the lullabies by adding a daily routine. To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
• In the Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
• Click + to add a new routine.
• Click + for "Enter routine name" and enter a suitable name.
• Click + for "When this happens" and choose one ("Schedule" for a daily, time based routine).
• Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
• Choose "Your Skills" > Select "Sleepy Lullabies" from the list ( you may have to scroll down some way).
• *** Premium Pack subscribers can enable looping of the lullabies directly from the routine. ***
• Choose a Device to play the lullabies from > SAVE.

REVIEWS AND FEEDBACK:

We hope you enjoy using the skill. If you love Sleepy Lullabies please consider writing a review, or send us an email with your feedback at andy@knownentity.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
